article_title: Shelter hit by Israeli strike in Gaza meant for vaccine rollout, says UN agency.
sentence: The  UN  agency  for  Palestinian  refugees,  UNRWA,  says  the  school-turned-shelter  in  Gaza's  Nuseirat  refugee  camp  -  where  at  least  22  Palestinians  are  reported  to  have  been  killed  by  an  Israeli  air  strike  yesterday  -  was  supposed  to  be  used  today  to  administer  polio  vaccines.
